Articles.Content:
It will be awesome if Tracking Station has a way of modify the order of the vessels, not only based on the time that they are on game, but with other options, like name of the vessel, or even a custom order.

Filter the vessels for tipe (satellite, space station) is already usefull, but not enough when you have that many stuff on space.

Create a custom category can be useful too.

 

Excuse me for my bad English. Support the topic with ideas of yours (Maybe Squad will read it). And hi every body on the forums! (I think that idea is good enough to make me be a    little more social)

Welcome gonsy.

It's a good idea, my list is very long and I keep hoping for it to be sortable.  I'd also like more categories to filter with, as "ship", "probe" etc isn't very specific. "Custom 1...4" would be handy so my commsats and scansat can be hidden but other probes still visible.
